events.title: Stanford University
events.description: A master student in computer science, I focus on artificial intelligence and human-computer interaction. In Winter 2013, I was teaching assistent of CS 231A, "Computer Vision: from 3D reconstruction to recognition".

events.title: Google
events.description: As a software engineer intern at Google Taipei, I worked on Chrome OS project and visualized kernel function calls of its graphics driver.

events.title: JustFont
events.description: I joined JustFont, a leading startup providing Chinese webfont, as a software engineer intern. I was responsible for developing an online webfont editor and maintaining JustFont's website.

events.title: National Taiwan University
events.description: Majoring in electrical engineering, I explored extensively in fields spanning from hardware to software. Some examples included solar cells, semiconductors, microcontroller, bio-engineering, and image processing.

projects.title: SNAP
projects.description: Joining the Stanford Network Analysis Project (SNAP) team, I implemented the RolX algorithm.
